titleStmt.title: The young mans monitor, or, A modest offer toward the pious, and vertuous composure of life from youth to riper years by Samuel Crossman.
titleStmt.author: Crossman, Samuel, 1624?-1684.
Crossman, Samuel, 1624?-1684. Young mans meditation.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. and are to be sold by S. Thompson and T. Parkhurst,

notesStmt.note: Includes his "The young mans meditation, or, Some few sacred poems" which has special t.p. and separate paging.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
